definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: Italy intend to use the slings and arrows as motivational therapy.
sentences.chinese: 意大利打算用吊索和弓箭作为激励疗法。

sentences.english: At this point we are ready to install the seat sling to the seat frame.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上，我们正在准备安装座位吊索的座架。

sentences.english: Cut short the wastage of the sling to reduce the intensity of labor.
sentences.chinese: 降低吊索具的消耗减轻工作人员的劳动强度。

sentences.english: A sling is the perfect answer to this problem.
sentences.chinese: 一吊索是一个完美的回答了这个问题。

sentences.english: Sling with a lifting gear kind.
sentences.chinese: 吊索具是起重工具的一种。

sentences.english: Lift a cylinder by its cap using a sling or a magnet.
sentences.chinese: 用吊索或磁铁通过钢瓶帽升起钢瓶。

sentences.english: Slings should be placed at one fourth of the length of pipe form each end.
sentences.chinese: 吊索的位置应放置在从两端起管道总长的四分之一处。

sentences.english: You can adjust the position of the sling to make both you and baby more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 您可以随时调整的立场，该吊索，使你和婴儿更舒适。

sentences.english: Take the seat sling and place the hood over the frame crown.
sentences.chinese: 以座位吊索和地点框架冠在引擎盖。

sentences.english: The Super Sex Sling facilitates an intense sexual experience.
sentences.chinese: 超级性吊索促进一个强烈的性经验。
吊索具是一种起重工具。

sentences.english: He didn't try to be helpful. We had a sling on him and he got out of it.
sentences.chinese: 他不想被援助，后来我们放吊索给他把他救了上来。

sentences.english: If lugs are not provided, slings should be used.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有配置凸耳，则应该采用吊索。

sentences.english: On back of board, nail in ring hangers and tie on hanging wire.
sentences.chinese: 木板背后钉入三角环悬挂架，用不锈钢吊索固定。

definition: a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
